1187810.name: Disc Creatures Original Soundtrack

18 Snowscape
19 Let's Go Home (ver. Azel)
20 Aquamarine Snow
21 Pressure
22 WALL
23 Wonder Fight

26 KLEIN
27 A Curious Tale ~Epilogue~
28 Retro Town

All music composed by SATTO.
